synopsis.text: Ickx's untold rescue story takes center stage in the newly announced short anime, Tales of the Rays: Everlasting Destiny. Produced by Bandai Namco, this anime delves into the unseen actions of Stahn and Leon during the Mirrage Prison chapter from the game's second act. Serving as a bridge to the game's third arc, 'Fairy's Requiem', this anime promises to enrich the overall narrative of the Tales of the Rays game app, offering fans an exciting new perspective.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
